attributes.action: Give all Key Workers 29.00 for each shift worked
attributes.additional_details: Debate this issue and award key workers payment for each shift worked , at the moment it seems that keyworkers have been forgotten and are expected to carry on putting themselves and there families at risk . I myself work in private care and feel very venerable when going to work it worries me and I know it also worries my colleagues but we have to go to work we have to pay bills too
attributes.background: To make a payment for each shift worked of 29.00, in these difficult times Key workers are out there working putting themselves at risk and there families , key workers are the forgotten front line
